title: Selection Notice: Join Our Family and Support the Growth of STM NGO!
summary: Dear Members of the STM Family, We are excited to share that STM (Service To Mankind Welfare Association) NGO is expanding its team to further strengthen our commitment to the development and empowerment of marginalized communities...

title: Vacancy Positions
summary: We are proud to announce new positions that will play a crucial role in the continued growth and success of Service. Please carefully review the following positions, along with their respective roles and responsibilities...

title: ELIGIBILITY CRITERIA
summary: Candidates must complete more than 20-24 Months in STM Member are eligible to apply for the position. Candidates should have a minimum experience of 10-12 Months in the Same Department. Candidates must have knowledge computer skills like Microsoft Word, Microsoft Excel, Microsoft PowerPoint

title: Address
